house_rules.aditional:
- If the room was left too much untidy, there is a possibility that I will charge you a penalty depending on extra cleaning fee would cost.

- Smoking is not allowed on this property except for the dec balcony. Please make sure to use the ashtray and be careful with the use of fire.

- Please leave all trash inside the property.

- Please be mindful of your noise levels especially after 7PM. 

- Please do not use a balcony after 8PM except for smoking.

- You can only use one set of linens per person. Please ask us if you would like to use more linens.

- No visitors allowed. Only guests with reservations are permitted on the property unless you ask me beforehand.

- Only guests who stay more than 2 nights can have BBQ with a pre-reservation. 
You will need to pay an extra fee for it and use the equipped stove and gas.
And please have BBQ only on the balcony, not inside the house. 
We ask you to finish it by 7PM as not to bother neighbors. 
Also please wash what you used and pack up when it is all done.

- We only allow one small dog with the extra fee and prior notice. 

- The room where you can put 3 futon mattresses is the space in-between the bedroom with a queen-sized bed and stairs. If you are worried about the structure of the accommodation, please feel free to send me an inquiry.

- If you don't follow my house rules above, I might be requesting you to pay the extra 30,000 yen per day as a penalty.

location_descriptions.title: Atami, Shizuoka, Japan
location_descriptions.content:
This accommodation is located in seaside holiday housing area surrounded by beautiful woods.
You will be able to see the ocean in far distance and if you are lucky enough, you might be able to see a top of Mt.Fuji on your left!

Ajiro station is about 5km away from my accommodation and you will need to ride up the hill all the way up. If you will be coming by train, I will suggest you to take a taxi from the station.
(I think it would cost about 1,500 yen if you use a taxi.)

You won't have troubles finding supermarkets and restaurants as there are so many of them around Ajiro Central.
This area has so many great aspects; beach, trekking course, some sightseeing places such as Kinomiya shrine, Atami central and Hatsushima (island).
I am sure that you won't get bored staying here!

Please enjoy this relaxed local living which you wouldn't be able to do in a rushy, busy city life.

location_descriptions.title: Getting around
location_descriptions.content:
Nearest stations：
Ajiro St.（Ito line）

○ 10 mins drive to Ajiro St.
○ 25 mins drive to Atami Central
○ 1 hr drive to Hakone hot springs
○ 2 hrs drive to Tokyo
○ 2 hrs drive to Yokohama
○ 3 hrs drive to Narita Airport
You can get to Tokyo St. to Ajiro St. within an hour using both a bullet train and local train.

Free parking lot：1 car
※ This listing is built in the hilly area so you will need to walk up stairs to get to the listing from the parking lot. If you have luggage to carry, you can park your car temporary at the space I will be showing in the check-in guide.

highlights.title: Great location
highlights.subtitle: 95% of recent guests gave the location a 5-star rating.

highlights.title: Furry friends welcome
highlights.subtitle: Bring your pets along for the stay.

highlights.title: Free cancellation for 48 hours
highlights.subtitle: Get a full refund if you change your mind.

description:
Just to feel the breeze and nature - this log-cabin house is where you will be able to have a relaxed time.
Trying to open up your five senses and gain what you need in this COVID-19 situation :-)

Ajiro is the small town of Atami and has so many yummy local restaurants and great activities such as fishing and water activities at the beach.

I have been receiving all the great reviews from everyone fortunately :-)
I am sure you will have a tremendous trip in Atami/Izu/Hakone by staying here!

The space
My accommodation is in the villa area just 10 minutes away from Ajiro station.
You will need to go up a hilly road but you will see a worthy view at the end!
From my accommodation, you will be able to see a great ocean and Atami Central area in a far distance...even Mt.Fuji if the weather is clear :-)

This log-cabin house will give you warm and heartfelt space.
Please enjoy your stay here in the nature-house as a family, friends or couple to have a special time.

I have prepared Wi-Fi to make your stay comfortable!
Please feel free to use it during your stay to work or have a movie night by watching Netflix :-)

In the main bedroom, I have prepared a queen-sized bed.
There is a cherry blossom tree just outside the bedroom so you will be able to enjoy "Ohanami" in the spring!
Bathroom is one of recommendations of the listing: you can enjoy natural hot springs in the traditional Japanese bath.

Also if you could pay me the extra cost and stick with my house rules, I am more than happy to rent you either BBQ grill and fireplace :-)

I am sure you won't get bored during your stay as there are so many great local restaurants where you can have yummy seafood and sightseeing place such as beaches :-)
You can also visit Hakone area or other popular places of Shizuoka-ken including Atami Central during your stay here in Ajiro area!

★Rooms★

1F: living-dining room (floor warmer is available!), kitchen, outside dec (a table with bench and 2 chairs, 2 relaxing chairs), bathroom (hot springs is available), toilet
2F: 2 bedrooms, working space

★Amenities★

[Rooms]
・WiFi （home WiFi）
・1 Queen-sized bed
・3 Futon mattress
・1 Sofa bed
・TV (connected with the internet)
I have prepared a wide-screen TV which is connected with Netflix. Please feel free to use the function during your stay!
・Humidifier
・Washing machine
・Washing detergent
・Iron
・Working chair & desk
・Dec chairs & table

[Kitchen]
・Fridge
・Multi cooker (it can be used as a rice cooker)
・Electric kettle
・Microwave
・Coffee dripper
・Hot plate
・Pots
・Pans
・Knives
・Cutlery
・Plates/cups
・Seasonings (Please understand that some seasonings might be run out.)
We don’t prepare any paper towels, dish towels or wipes.
If you need one to do the cooking, please kindly bring your own.

[Bathroom]
・Body soap
・Shampoo
・Conditioner

Guest access
Please feel free to use the entire house.

Other things to note
・Please use a designated BBQ equipment.
As a few guests don't pack up BBQ within the time I ask them to (until 7PM), I only allow BBQ for those guests who stay more than 1 night.
If you would like to use it, please message me beforehand as it costs extra.

・You can bring only ONE small sized dog with the extra fee. Please message me beforehand if you would like to take your doggie with you.

・you CANNOT smoke inside the house.
Smoking is not allowed on this property except for outside balcony and please be careful with the use of fire.

・Please separate the trash.
If you left way more than the normal use and big-sized trash (such as suitcases), please understand that I might be able to asking you to pay the extra fee.

・The gas meter may get stopped when you use the gas too much.
When that happens, please read through the guidance left inside the listing or message me.

・You can go down the hilly part of my garden however, please be careful as it is quite steep and there are some wild animals out there.

・The room where you can put 3 futon mattresses is the space in-between the bedroom with a queen-sized bed and stairs. If you are worried about the structure of the accommodation, please feel free to send me an inquiry.

[For guests who stay more than 2 weeks]
I can schedule a cleaning, changing linens and adding amenities during your stay so please feel free to message me if you want one.

We are asking guests to let me know the information below so that we can operate legally as official hotel-licensed listings.
1) The names of all the guests in your booking
2) Each of the guests’ home addresses
3) Each of the guests’ occupations
4) Each of the guests’ nationalities and passport numbers
5) Scanned images of guests’ passports

Registration number
Hotels and Inns Business Act | 静岡県熱海保健所 | 熱保衛第331号の91
